question: Which country was the location of the military intervention "Operation Uphold Democracy"?
explanation: Haiti was the location of the military intervention "Operation Uphold Democracy". Operation Uphold Democracy was a military intervention designed to remove the military regime installed by the 1991 Haitian coup d'etat that overthrew the elected President Jean-Bertrand Aristide. The operation was effectively authorized by the 31 July 1994 United Nations Security Council Resolution 940.
